result.execSummary:
The defendant Alexander P. MUELLER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes: Maintain full-time employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Conply with sex offender registry and treatment.

Have no contact with anyone under the age of 18 unless approved by the agent.

Have no contact with the victim, W.E.D.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 12-02-15 at 9:00 a.m.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

ADDRESS INFO for Alexander P. MUELLER
Current: 744 S. 17th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 08-05-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

At 2:17 p.m., $200.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Order for Modifying Defendant's Bail.
It is hereby ordered that the cash bail ordered by the court is lowered to $200.00  cash.  All other conditions shall remain the same.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 09-23-15 at 9:00 a.m.
MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
The parties have a joint recommendation for amend the bail to $200.00 cash with the same conditions.  The Court grants the motion and signs the appropriate order.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.
Adam Snavely, through Public Defender.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-05-15 at 2:00 p.m.   
Minutes.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of 2nd degree sexual assault.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-27-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with the conditions that he have no contact with W.E.D., DOB: 01-25-2001 and that he maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed. 
Minutes.
